Projects.name: Make Me Smile
Projects.info: I designed the app Make me smile for my friend. For now it's only half done as I am thinking of new features to add. This app allows us to see each other's location has a personal chat for us to communicate securely. And has a list of pics that we considered to our best memories. I had designed this to gift her on her birthday. This app is also password protected to prevent others from seeing our memories and chats.

Projects.name: WishThem
Projects.info: Embarrassed because you forgot to wish your friend. Never forget to wish your friend again. Just tell us your friend's birthdays, anniversaries etc. a few more details and leave the rest to us.

Projects.name: Matrix Operations
Projects.info: This app does all sorts of matrix operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, finding inverse, determinant, adjoint, range and eigenvalues & vectors. You can also use it to find solutions of equations using different methods. This app displays step by step solution to all problems.

Projects.name: Make A Note
Projects.info: This gtk application helps you save some important things without having to switch to a different app. Simply start this app and use the icon in the status bar to add and view notes

Projects.name: 20-20-20-rule
Projects.info: Reminds you to look every 20 mins away from your computer screen to relax your eyes

Projects.name: Simple Budget
Projects.info: Easily manage all your money. Track your spends and earnings. Tag you transactions. Add transaction specific notes.
